West Coast Vets

services contact

    Services

    West Coast Vets offers extensive services for small, large and equine animals, all delivered by our expert staff.

    Small Animals

    Surgery, dental, neutering, vaccination, microchipping, and more

    Large Animals

    Consultations, on-farm visits, TB testing, and more

    Equine

    Pre-purchase vetting, ultrasounds, x-rays, blood tests, reproduction services, and more

About Us

our mission and values

West Coast Vets is a mixed veterinary practice, serving Connemara and West Galway. Our team works hard to make your visit to the vet as stress- free and compassionate as possible, ensuring high quality care and focus on your petâ€™s health.

Our Team

We have a fantastic team of passionate and dedicated vets. We're tight-knit team who've been working together for years and we always have a friendly and cheerful atmosphere.

Sara Roche, BVMS

Director & Vet

John Mulligan, BVMS

Director & Vet

All our vets are highly trained and dedicated to their job. Weâ€™re committed to bringing you the best in pet healthcare. We are accredited professionals specialised in multiple fields of vetinary and strive to maintain the highest levels of education and techniques.

Stephanie Klapp

Discovered this practise after return from Germany through a friend. Cannot praise them highly enough. They came out to put my wee dog to sleep after the vet practise who had treated his illness for past few months (due to being so nearby) refused to come out. Would recommend without slightest hesitation.

They take their time to explain what is going on with my dogs (even going to the extent of drawing out anatomical drawings of the areas with issues). Couldn't recommend more highly.

Brid Ann Curran

What a great service. Visited after hours and had no hassle in giving me appointment. Had a conversation with me over the phone first that was very reassuring. Spotlessly clean, John was our veterinary doctor and he was very thorough in his examination. He arranged surgery for the following few days and I have to say I was never as relaxed about leaving a pet for surgery. Aftercare was brilliant and we collected a very happy wlittle pet in the evening. Reasonably priced compared to other veterinary practices in the area. They treat large and small animals which is great and also do call outs. Will definitely be returning. We'll done to John & his team.
